entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 09:49 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
